entry.title: All the Ss of Shredding
entry.summary:
Hi there, fam!

After an entire year away from this blog (I was playing outside...) I am back to tell you a little bit of what I am up to.

You all know my obsession for board sports (surf, skate, snow), and now I will be producing some cool stuff for you.

First, go follow me at my IG: @miashreds, you will be up to date on what I am up to, where I am shredding and which competitions I am at.

Second, I am about to announce some really awesome news, so stay tuned :)
